comment.body:
Thx mynameislegion, 
And how do I know witch pod im using ?

Have you read the tutorial first ? 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial+new

Also a good place for questions is :  
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj/ZeroNet+help+FAQ
something must be wrong on your side, you should see 200+ peers
P2P is bad on Tor due to the bandwith it consume, Most of the time Zeronet sites are light.
ZeroNet is decentralised on the search of new peers, then content is shared in a distributed fashion among peers.
I never taught about brigning the pollitical dimention of a network to measure his "decentralness",  it's quite interesting Thx for the share @cyberslave

There is command line you can pass to mirror a site. If I recall, 
You might just need to fill a crontab.
test, you are kinda requesting for spam :p
